name: Concha Buika
description: '''María Concepción Balboa Buika''' (born 11 May 1972), known as '''Concha Buika''' or just '''Buika''', is a Spanish singer. Her album ''[[Niña de Fuego]]'' was nominated for the 2008 [[Latin Grammy Award for Album of the Year]] and ''La Noche Más Larga'' was nominated for [[Grammy Award for Best Latin Jazz Album|Best Latin Jazz Album]] at the [[56th Annual Grammy Awards]] in 2014.
